articles.title: Not Rohit Sharma or Hardik Pandya! Delhi's Subodh Bhati becomes first Indian to slam double ton in T20 cricket - Times Now
articles.description: Subodh Bhati has made the headlines just when the IPL league's expansion talks are on and a mega auction is set to take place ahead of 2022 season. He has become the first Indian to slam a double ton in T20s.
articles.content:
• Delhi's Subodh Bhati has become India's first-ever double centurion in T20 cricket
  • Bhati achieved the feat during a club game, between Delhi XI and Simba
